definitions.definition: To smoothen or even a surface (especially a connection or junction on a surface).
To bring into perfect alignment (especially about rivet holes when connecting structural members).
To make an animation smooth , removing any jerkiness .
To construct or design with the aim of producing a smooth outline or reducing air drag or water resistance.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To smoothen or even a surface (especially a connection or junction on a surface).
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To bring into perfect alignment (especially about rivet holes when connecting structural members).
( transitive , art ) To make an animation smooth , removing any jerkiness .
( transitive ) To construct or design with the aim of producing a smooth outline or reducing air drag or water resistance.
( transitive , obsolete ) To make fair or beautiful.
